job.title: Data Scientist, Product Analytics
job.description: pAbout TikTokppTikTok is the leading destination for shortform mobile video Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles New York London Paris Berlin Dubai Mumbai Singapore Jakarta Seoul and TokyoppbrppWhat Youll Dopp Work with the product team to size the potential impact of problemstosolve for our businesspp Develop comprehensive product metrics and quantitative measurement structure based on product stages and business purposespp Implement standardized product reports ad hoc queries and data related projectspp Design and implement reporting dashboards and the associated data pipeline to deliver insights and improve the workflows of internal teamspp Partner closely with key stakeholders to optimize overall product adoption and performance driven growth Provide suggestions for improvements to align with the business goalpp Measure and visualize the effectiveness of product updates conduct research and analysis on various business processes to identify business problems and further provide optimization suggestions to improve operating efficiencyppbrppWho Were Looking Forpp 2 years industry experiencepp Bachelors degree or equivalent practical experiencepp Ability to conduct rigorous analysis and communicate conclusions to both technical and nontechnical audiencespp Experience in business analysis and product analysispp Proficiency in SQL Pythonpp Solid communication and collaboration skills with the ability to work effectively with internal teams in a crosscultural and crossfunctional environmentpp Proven ability to succeed in an innovative and fastpaced environmentppbrppEven better ifpp Masters degree in data analytics related fieldspp Product management experience is a plusp
